questions.question: When should my order arrive?
questions.answer: You should expect your order to ship within 3-5 business days.

questions.question: What is the return policy?
questions.answer: You can return your products within 30 days of the delivery date.

questions.question: Do you guys verify the quality of all the items?
questions.answer: Yes, we only sell second-hand products that are of good or excellent quality!

questions.question: How can I sell my clothes to you guys?
questions.answer: Deposit your clothes in the secure Studrip dropoff bin at your university.

questions.question: Are there plus sizes available?
questions.answer: We have clothing available in all sizes!

questions.question: Do you currently have to be a student to shop at this store?
questions.answer: Yes, you can only make an account if you have a student email.
